Name: House of Hope
ActDescription:
Authority Level: Raise it to gain bonuses (stack with every level). Clear stages to gain EXP.

Unlocking: Every chapter is unlocked at a different time.

Special Event: Certain chapters have conditional bonuses.
Guaranteed Drops: [6â˜… Memory Drop] guarantee progress will be inherited (all stages).

Multi-Challenge: No cost or rewards if you quit in advance or disconnect.

Auto Clear: Auto Clear will be activated at the required Authority Level. Clear a stage at least once to be able to Auto Clear the stage.
